title: Lordstown, Williams-Sonoma, Burlington: What to Watch When the Stock Market Opens Today
sub_head: Investors bought up shares of Williams-Sonoma after the retailer raised its dividend
body:
U.S. stock futures are wavering after major indexes hit another set of record highs. Here’s what we’re watching before the bell.
